entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 2:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: ESE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning early this evening. Risk of a thundershower overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening then becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 near midnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
